headline: China’s rare earth controls can ‘forbid any country on Earth from participating in the modern economy,’ former White House advisor warns
summary: "They can do this because they diligently built industrial capacity no one else had the fortitude to build."

raw.headline: China’s rare earth controls can ‘forbid any country on Earth from participating in the modern economy,’ former White House advisor warns

headline: China Tells US to Back Off on Threats, Warns of Retaliation
summary: President Donald Trump on Friday announced an additional 100% tariff on China as well as export controls on “any and all critical software” beginning Nov. 1, hours after threatening to cancel an upcoming meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping.

raw.headline: China Tells US to Back Off on Threats, Warns of Retaliation
raw.summary: President Donald Trump on Friday announced an additional 100% tariff on China as well as export controls on “any and all critical software” beginning Nov. 1, hours after threatening to cancel an upcoming meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping.

headline: China says Qualcomm admitted to acquiring Autotalks without informing regulator
summary: HONG KONG (Reuters) -U.S. semiconductor manufacturer Qualcomm admitted that it had not informed Chinese authorities when it completed its acquisition of Israel's Autotalks in June, China's market regulator said on Sunday.  The disclosure was made two days after China launched an antitrust investigation into Qualcomm, examining whether the U.S. firm violated China's antitrust law by not declaring some details of its acquisition of the Israeli chip designer.  Qualcomm did not immediately respond to Reuters' request for comment.
